data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Re-implement rotation test, add linear acceleration test, add motor-cutoff tests for dingo & jackal (#7)

* Re-implement the rotation test to be an IMU check instead of odometry

* Re-enable rotation tests for all platforms with an integrated IMU. Add IMU tilt test to Dingo variants

* Clarified log messages, use consistent accuracy vs error terminology

* Allow wider margins on the Jackal IMU tests, as it is a component with known lower quality

* Minor code cleanup & refactoring for consistency

* Add motor-cutoff tests for Jackal, Dingo

data.author: Tony Baltovski
data.message: Fixed topic of fans test. (#6)

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Changes

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Move the spin into the foreground thread, just sleep in the background one

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Don't call spin_once in the primary thread; doing so can raise an exception if both run at the same time

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Revert "Don't run the e-stop test UI in a second thread"

This reverts commit a6edfb2bf3029bae9335926e24c3eaf57e9138ee.

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Don't run the e-stop test UI in a second thread

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Revert "Add a try/catch block around spin_once calls to catch occasional errors that get raised, causing the test application to crash"

This reverts commit 09b59974884f8019fef44463b0c0ceec31fb2d90.

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Add a 2s delay between clearing the e-stop and moving the wheels

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Add a try/catch block around spin_once calls to catch occasional errors that get raised, causing the test application to crash

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Remove CAN device ID count for platforms that don't use CANopen

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Lower the time threshold for linear drive test to 0.75 (from 0.8)

data.message: Ensure the firmware is 2.3 or higher to allow fan control; otherwise just skip the fan test

Re-enable the fan tests (#4)

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Linter

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Rewrite rotation test (#2)

* Overhaul the logic of the rotation to use an accumulator instead of relying on the latest odom data. Factor in the rate of the EKF + the odometry twist instead of just looking at positional data. On 00005 we're still overshooting slightly, but it's now within the margin of error

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Append the can interface to the node name to suppress duplicate node name warning

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Changes

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Note that the IDs are CANopen, and could be incorrect for other devices. Add a TODO notice about this since it'll matter for Pumas

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Use the last 7 bits for the CAN ID, sort the IDs in the final report

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Changes

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message:
Simplify linear driving test (#1)

* Remove the TF from the linear drive test; we can simplify the code if we just do a basic pythagorean transformation (assuming the ground is flat)

* Publish the velocity command first, then log completion

* Reduce logging; it's high-frequency and doesn't provide much useful information anyway

* Add another log entry for when we receive the first odometry data

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Changes

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Reduce the minimum duration for a rotation. Log possible false-positives during the rotation test. Print the calculated duration error for the rotation & drive tests

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Log the version of clearpath_tests in the report

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Increase the length of expected lynx messages to 5, cast the length to an integer before comparing it

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Invert the angle of the lateral test

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Add a mutex to prevent issues with reading & writing the current & previous orientations asynchronously; this sometimes causes false positives or false negatives during the test

data.author: Chris Iverach-Brereton
data.message: Don't fail if we get controller_manager rate errors

data.message: Add newline between average motor currents in report

data.message: Increase the allowed margin of error on the IMU test to 20% (from 10%)

data.message: Invert the angles; gravity is effectively rotating in the opposite direction as we're tilting the robot, so a positive rotation of the robot results in a negative rotation of gravity

data.message: Refactor the rotation & distance tests to add a new mobility test superclass. Add a lynx safety subscription to abort the test if we get motor errors (e.g. rotation on carpet is a likely trigger)
